characters.name: Witchie
characters.description: A friendly witch still learning the ways of the island. She seeks to uncover the past of her familiar cat Fluffy, and might stumble upon something bigger than she thought...

characters.name: Chisuay
characters.description: The leader of the village. He found out that the shrooms can be infused to make one of the best tea there is, and thanks him the village now strives.

characters.name: Old Brass Eye
characters.description: This blind old man may seem intimidating at first, but his knowledge of the region is matched only by his storytelling skills.
